Earn miles just for paying your gas bill!

New miles earning structure effective January 1, 2015*

It’s easy to start participating.

Simply enter your ONG account and Skymiles member information below. if you’d prefer to enroll by phone, call ONG(toll-free) at 1-888-466-4427 and mention that you would like to enroll in ONG’s Delta SkyMiles partnership program. Please have your SkyMiles account number handy when you call.

Ohio Natural Gas Account InformationRequired*

Forgot your Skymiles Number?

Switch to Ohio Natural Gas (ONG) and start earning with Delta SkyMiles®.

Ohio Natural Gas is excited to be a Delta SkyMiles partner and the only natural gas supplier in Ohio with whom you can earn miles from Delta just for paying your natural gas bill.

HOW IT WORKS:

  • Customers will now earn TWO miles for every dollar spent on their ONG supplier natural gas charges (excluding sales tax and one-time charges)!
  • And, if you are a Delta SkyMiles® Medallion® member, Delta will award an additional mile for each dollar spent as described above!
